description: Jharkhand Rajya Fasal Rahat Yojana provides financial assistance to farmers for crop losses due to natural calamities, replacing traditional crop insurance.
key_features: Compensation for crop loss up to Rs. 4000 per acre
Covers natural calamities like drought and flood

benefits.coverage: Crop losses due to natural calamities

special_notes: No premium payment required by farmers
Focus on small and marginal farmers
